long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RapidRead is a lightweight and user-friendly Chrome extension that automatically bolds specific letters in the text on any website. The extension makes it easy for users to spot patterns and enhance their browsing experience and enables you to read 300% faster!

Automatically detects text on a webpage and applies the bold transformation when the extension icon is clicked.

Works on any website, providing seamless integration and instant transformation with just one click!

Simply click the extension icon, and watch as the text on the page is transformed and start reading faster instantly!

Give RapidRead a try and discover a new way to interact with text on the web.
